<h1 id="newsletter_july_2014" class="sectionedit1">NEWSLETTER August&nbsp;2015</h1>
<p>Welcome to the first NKI newsletter. With this newsletter we want to inform everyone in the Research about recent developments within the Research. As you can see below, the news items can be quite diverse; from new equipment or protocols to changes in the Research staff. It does not replace the info posted on the Antonet, the intranet sites of research facilities or the NKI website. The newsletter will be published quarterly.</p>
<p>Feedback on this first newsletter is much appreciated and if you have news items for the next newsletter you can also send them to us. The newsletter is prepared by Mariet van den Berg and Henri van Luenen, the technical development of the page was done by Jelle ten Hoeve.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
